alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:56PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of southeastern Sierra and northeastern Dona Ana Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 454 PM MDT, weather observations reported a strong thunderstorm winds of 30 to 50 mph moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Weather observations IMPACT...Gusty winds will produce dense blowing dust and lower visibilities and could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Upham, Arrey, Caballo, Truth or Consequences, Derry, Engle, Cutter, Palomas, City of Elephant Butte, Spaceport America, Williamsburg, Ash Canyon, Elephant Butte Lake and Caballo Lake. This includes Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 52 and 61, between mile markers 63 and 64, and between mile markers 73 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes
